resources.string: Read External Storage permission is needed to select Image. Please turn on the requested permission from Settings > Permissions.

Camera and External Storage permissions are needed to capture the image. Turning off any permission won\'t allow the application to run smoothly. Please turn on all requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
Storage permission is needed to pick gallery image. Please allow storage permission from Settings > Permissions.
Camera and Storage permissions are needed to take a picture. Please allow both the requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
Storage permission is needed to take a picture. Please allow storage permission from Settings > Permissions.
Failed to create Camera image file
